description: ANVIL: Execute 'hello.py' using the sovereign Anvil runtime (static binary).
command: ./oss_sovereignty/sys_09_Anvil/build/anvil oss_sovereignty/sys_09_Anvil/hello.py
result: SUCCESS: >> HELLO WORLD FROM THE ANVIL

description: ANVIL: Verify global binary installation with a new hello world.
command: anvil -c "print('ANVIL GLOBAL: HELLO WORLD')"
result: SUCCESS: ANVIL GLOBAL: HELLO WORLD

description: SYSTEM: Deep scan for non-essential documentation, tests, and static assets.
command: find . -type d -name 'doc' -o -name 'docs' ...
result: IDENTIFIED: ~15.8 MB of removable content (Sphinx docs, Tests, Windows/Zephyr ports).

description: KERNEL: Analyze and strip unused kernel modules (fs, raid, virt).
command: sudo modprobe -r btrfs raid10 ...
result: SUCCESS: Stripped btrfs, raid*, kvm, joydev, wacom. Kept: wifi, bt, video, sound.

description: SECURITY: Scan userland binaries and identify Anvil violations (compilers, interpreters, net-tools).
command: python3 scan_binaries.py && python3 analyze_bloat.py
result: FLAGGED: 158 binaries (~279MB) for removal. (apt, make, curl, perl, etc.)

description: SOVEREIGNTY: Initialize directory structure for new systems: HyperVision and AlloyDB.
command: mkdir -p oss_sovereignty/sys_10_HyperVision oss_sovereignty/sys_11_AlloyDB
result: SUCCESS: Created sys_10_HyperVision and sys_11_AlloyDB.

description: SOVEREIGNTY: Map flagged legacy binaries to sovereignty cards.
command: python3 create_bin_folders.py
result: SUCCESS: Created 158 binary placeholders in oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin.

description: SOVEREIGNTY TEST: Assimilate 'curl' (legacy_bin) from public repo. Clone, Kill Git, Mark.
command: python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/NETWORK_CLIENTS/curl https://github.com/curl/curl.git
result: SUCCESS: Assimilated curl. Git severed. Metadata marked.

description: SOVEREIGNTY: Assimilate Linux Kernel source (Depth 1).
command: python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/sys_01_Linux_Kernel https://github.com/torvalds/linux.git
result: SUCCESS: Assimilated Linux Kernel (Torvalds/Linux). Git severed.

description: SOVEREIGNTY: Assimilate SELinux Userspace tools and libraries.
command: python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/sys_02_SELinux https://github.com/SELinuxProject/selinux.git
result: SUCCESS: Assimilated SELinux Project. Git severed.
